145027.<center>闘戦士 <cs_pchero>。\n汝が たどりし道を 今ここに:
Fighter <cs_pchero>. The path thou hast
taken has brought you here once again.

145028.<center>恐れることなく どんな困難にも立ち向かう\n勇気の心。:
A courageous heart to face any challenge
without fear.

145029.<center>すべてを愛し 許す\n慈愛の心。: A kind heart that loves and forgives all.

145030.<center>物事を深く考え 真理に到達する\n英知の心。:
A wise heart that thinks deeply about things
and arrives at the truth.

145031.<center>どんな苦境に立たされても あきらめない\n希望の心。:
A hopeful heart that never gives up, no matter
the odds.

145032.<center>４つの心を 糧として\n正義の心を 解き放て。:
With these four hearts to sustain you, it is
time to unleash the heart of justice.

145034.「……ふう なんとか 間に合ったようですね。: ...Phew, we made it just in time.

145035.「私としたことが こんな大事な時に\n 遅刻するなんて……。:
I can't believe we were running late at such a
crucial time...

145036.「ふふ。\n 聖光教主さまに お会いできるとあって\n みんな 興奮しているみた:
Fufu. It seems everyone's a bit excited to
finally meet the Light Lord.

145038.「我ら 勇気 慈愛 英知 希望……\n ４つの心を司る 光導使なり。:
We are the guiding light of the four hearts:
Courage, Kindness, Wisdom, and Hope.

145039.「我らが主 聖光教主と 交わせし誓いのもと\n 選ばれし闘戦士を 導かん。:
We exchange our vows with our master, the
Light Lord, and guide the chosen fighter.

145040.「勇気 慈愛 英知 希望の心を示し\n 正義の心を宿すは 闘戦士 <pc>なり。:
Courage, kindness, wisdom, hope, and justice
lay within the heart of fighter <pc>.

145041.「闘戦士 <pc>よ。\n いざ 聖光を呼び覚ます光芒となれ！:
O fighter <pc>. Be the glow that
awakens the Holy Light!

145042.「さあ あなたも 祈りを捧げてください。: Now, you must pray, as well.

145043.「やあ はじめまして～。僕は 聖光教主。\n きみが 勇敢なる闘戦士 <pc>だ:
Hi, nice to meet you～. I'm the Light Lord.
You must be the brave fighter <pc>,
right?

145044.「きみの活躍は 彼女たちを通して見ていたよ～。\n よくぞ 僕を呼び起こしてくれ:
I've been watching you through them. You did
well to awaken me. Your spirit of justice
has touched my heart as well.

145045.「さっそくだけど きみが手にした 正義の心で\n 最後のチカラの解放を 行なうと:
So let's get on with it, and with the heart of
justice in your hands, let's unleash the last
of your power.

145046.「っと その前に。\n ミーミ！ ナズナ！ メナー！ ミナナ！:
But first things first. Meemi! Nazuna! Menna!
Minana!

145047.「……お会いしとうございました 聖光教主さま。: ...We are so glad to see you, Light Lord.

145048.「あたしも！ あたしも！！ \n ずーっと 会いたかったの！\n ねえ 聖光教主:
Me too! Me too! I've wanted to meet you for so
long! Hey, Light Lord! Let me fluff you up～!

145049.「ちょっと ナズナ！ やめてよ。\n 聖光教主さまに もふもふするのは 私よ。:
Hey, Nazuna! Stop it. I'm the one who's
supposed to be fluffing Light Lord.

145050.「ふ ふたりとも ずるいです……！\n 私だって もふもふしたいです……！:
Both of you are so sneaky...! I want to fluff
him too...!

145051.「ははっ。きみたちは いつも元気だなあ～。\n でも その前にやらなきゃいけない:
Haha. You guys are always so energetic～. But
first, I have something I need to do. You'll
help me out with that, won't you?

145053.「うん いい子たちだ。よ～しよし。\n それじゃ 準備はいいかい？:
Yeah, good girls. All right, all right. Okay,
then. You ready?

145054.「おどろいたようだね～。\n 今までのは 彼女たちの仮の姿で\n こっちが 本来:
You seem surprised～. What you've been seeing
was just their temporary forms, and these are
their true forms.

145055.「きみは 虚無の邪神の手先に 封印されていた\n ミナナを 救ってくれたね？:
You saved Minana from being sealed away by the
Dark Deity of Nihility's minion, didn't you?

145056.「かつて 奴らと戦っていたとき\n 彼女たちは このとおり 僕の聖具として\n:
When I was fighting them in the past, these
girls became my sacrament and my strength.

145057.「……虚無の邪神の眷属は あの戦い以来 \n 息を潜めているけど 奴らが ふたた:
The Dark Deity of Nihility has been holding
their breath since that battle, but it won't
be long until they show their face again.

145058.「日増しに 強くなるアストルティアの魔瘴……。 \n 大いなる闇の根源と呼ばれる:
The demon miasma in Astoltia grows stronger by
the day... You know the source of it all is a
being known as the Great Source of Darkness.

145059.「大いなる闇の根源……それは\n 創世の女神ルティアナさまと対峙し\n アストル:
The Great Source of Darkness... the supreme
evil that opposes Lutiana, the Goddess of
Creation, and tries to destroy Astoltia.

145060.「きみには その真名を知る権利がある。 \n 今こそ 告げよう 呪われし名を……:
You have the right to know its true name. Now
it is time to tell you that accursed name...

145061.「異界滅神 ジャゴヌバ。 \n ……それこそが このアストルティアに\n 仇なす:
Jagonuba, the Otherworldly Destroyer... that
is the name of the one who aggresses upon
Astoltia.

145062.「決戦の日は そう遠くない。 \n どうか これからも 鍛錬に励んでほしい。\n:
The day of the decisive battle is soon
approaching. Please continue to train hard.
Come on! Hold high the Justice Crest.

145063.<pc>は 正義の紋章を空高く かかげた。:
<pc> hefted the Justice Crest high in
the sky.

145064.「うん。強くやさしい きみらしい正義だ。\n 闘戦士 <pc>の 正義のチカラ。:
Yes. Your justice is strong, yet gentle. The
power of fighter <pc>'s justice. I
have indeed received it.

145065.「我が 乙女たちに導かれ\n 高潔なる闘戦士 現れし時\n 聖光届きて 我 道標:
Guided by my maidens, a noble fighter arises,
their holy light reaches me and becomes my
beacon...!

145066.「勇気 慈愛 英知 希望が示す\n 闘戦士 <pc>の 正義のチカラよ\n ……:
Courage, kindness, wisdom, and hope are the
power of fighter <pc>'s justice...
Let it open the way to their next path!

145067.「<pc>。\n これで 僕の役目もおわりだ。 \n 短い間だったけど お別れの:
<pc>. With this, my role is
completed. It's time to say goodbye, however
brief our meeting has been.

145068.「僕は 聖光のチカラを たくわえるために\n また眠らなきゃ。\n 来たるべき:
I must sleep once more to cultivate the power
of the holy light. I shall see you again when
the proper time comes.
